commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Oh, Setsuna! We're here to cheer you on!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: My goodness, you came! Thank you very much!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Looks like you're doing quite well for yourself here.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, I am so glad I asked for Ayumu's help. I don't think I would have been able to serve this many people by myself at all.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Now I understand just how incredible Kanata is at managing all of this on her own. She is definitely deserving of her scholarship.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: The two of you aren't even in the same course as her, right? That makes the two of you rather incredible in your own right.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I think so, too. Just look at the smiles on the faces of everyone who's eaten your treats!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I'll bet there are some real foodies around here as well, so the fact that you've met their standards is really impressive!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I owe all of that to Kanata's recipe and Ayumu's help. I couldn't have possibly done this on my own.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You say that, but you wouldn't have participated if you weren't confident in your abilities, would you?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No, I had practically zero confidence.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: But you still offered to stand in?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I saw how much work Kanata put into preparing for today...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I couldn't help but put myself in her shoes and imagine how sad I would feel to work so hard, yet not be able to present my final recipe.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I just knew I had to do something for her. I felt that it was my duty!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Sounds like you're all pretty close in your club too.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Of course, we're members of the same club, after all. And it's only natural to want to support anyone who was working as hard as she was.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Yeah, I know exactly how you feel.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh no, I lost myself in the conversation.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Please, go ahead and have some.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Thank...you?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Huh? This looks way different from what Ayumu was making...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Go on, don't be shy.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Oh, is it okay if I try it?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes. I just finished making it, and I'm really proud of how it came out!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Then I'll dig right in! *Chomp*

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Urk?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: How does it taste?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: E-Eek!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Ruby?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: H-Huh? Ruby?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh! Setsuna, where did that cake come from?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Huh? Wh-What's going on? What just happened?
